"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/546fdfe863687275eae60100#post_546fdfe863687275eae60100

This is gonna sound weird, I can't bring myself to really get pissed at someone or something. I get frustrated but if I have the time to feel like that, I can use that time to find a solution, so those feelings don't even last because I'm more focused on how to solve them.
